## Proposed Changes

Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed. Include context and motivation.

- Type of change: (bug fix, feature, docs, tests, chore)

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines (black/isort)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass
- [ ] I have added documentation where necessary

## Reviewers
Please request review from an appropriate maintainer or add `@willjy1` as a reviewer.
